name: RI_1_1_24_1_Evidence_of_Record_Entry_Legal_Hold_Removal_Event
title: RI.1.1.24.1 Evidence of Record Entry Legal Hold Removal Event (Function)
description: Maintain Evidence of Record Entry Legal Hold Removal Event
purpose: Evidence of Record Entry Legal Hold Removal Event includes key metadata, ensures health record integrity (and trust) and enables record audit.

statement.label: RI.1.1.24.1#01
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD audit each occurrence when a set of Record Entries are released from legal hold.

statement.label: RI.1.1.24.1#02
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD capture identity of the organization where Record Entries are released from legal hold.

statement.label: RI.1.1.24.1#03
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the patient who is subject of Record Entries released from legal hold.

statement.label: RI.1.1.24.1#04
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the user releasing Record Entries from legal hold.

statement.label: RI.1.1.24.1#05
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the system application which released Record Entries from legal hold.

statement.label: RI.1.1.24.1#06
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD capture the type of Record Event trigger (i.e., released from legal hold).

statement.label: RI.1.1.24.1#07
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture the date and time Record Entries are released from legal hold.

statement.label: RI.1.1.24.1#08
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD capture identity of the location (i.e., network address) where Record Entries are released from legal hold.

statement.label: RI.1.1.24.1#09
statement.requirement: The system MAY capture the rationale for releasing Record Entries from legal hold.
